title: Lay Here
lyrics:
Stoned like I lay here
Lay here
Lay here
Stoned like I lay here
Lay here
Lay here alone
When you were on the ground
& it's driving me crazy
& it's driving me crazy
& it's driving me crazy
& it's driving me crazy
& it's driving me crazy
& it's driving me crazy
& it's driving me crazy
& it's driving me crazy
